docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Development Phing targets $ phing setup : Prepare project for development. $ phing qa : Run quality tests, use this before every commit. $ phing refresh : Update generated files (changelog, images, etc). Using proxy behind a Phing If you are developing behind a proxy, you have to set the environment variable http_proxy . This variable is imported in buildfile. Conventions This project adheres to: git-flow Semantic Versioning Keep a changelog pds/skeleton
docs.title: Dev

docs.text: $ phing setup : Prepare project for development. $ phing qa : Run quality tests, use this before every commit. $ phing refresh : Update generated files (changelog, images, etc).
docs.title: Phing targets

docs.text: If you are developing behind a proxy, you have to set the environment variable http_proxy . This variable is imported in buildfile.
docs.title: Using proxy behind a Phing

docs.text: This project adheres to: git-flow Semantic Versioning Keep a changelog pds/skeleton
docs.title: Conventions

docs.text: Known issues Number handling When using case-converter you cannot use a number as separator. In practice this means that a number is not considered as a word: As shown in the previous example, there is no way to go back to the original input string (i.e. hello-8-world ), in kebab case this sting is written as hello8-world .
docs.title: Known issues

docs.text: When using case-converter you cannot use a number as separator. In practice this means that a number is not considered as a word: As shown in the previous example, there is no way to go back to the original input string (i.e. hello-8-world ), in kebab case this sting is written as hello8-world .
docs.title: Number handling
